name: setBanner
description:
Updates the announcement banner configuration.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

isDismissible.description: Flag indicating if the announcement banner can be dismissed by the user.

isEnabled.description: Flag indicating if the announcement banner is enabled or not.

message.description: The text on the announcement banner.

visibility.description: Visibility of the announcement banner. Can be public or private.
